group_1.textCenter: [chara:101201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]*Sigh* That was sooo awesome!
("Detective Maid Mei".)
(You only get this kinda quality from the@author of Kirin!)
(So much fun! It's a shame it's such a@short series!)
(Now I wanna draw up a story with a maid@character in it.)
...[wait:1.0][chara:101201:cheek_0][chara:101201:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json:eyeClose_1][chara:101201:lipSynch_1]Weh.
Oh no! I can't think of a single thing!
I wanna think up something good. A story@that'll knock Alina's socks off...
I need some kind of inspiration.

group_1.textRight: Let's see... Maids, maids... What makes a@maid? Maids are...um...

group_1.textCenter: Hm? Maids are...
Ah!
(Someone's slumped on the swing set over@there.)
I'm gonna go check on them!
A maid must serve a master...
But all humans should be equal. Is it right@for us to employ a master-servant dynamic?
No, that's not what I should be focusing on@right now.
I have to consider what it is that makes a@good maid.
Ugh... This is tougher than fighting@Witches.
(She's wondering about maids too?)
(That's perfect! I'll ask what happened to@her!)

group_1.textRight: Um, 'scuse me, miss. What are you doing@here?

group_1.textLeft: I didn't notice that someone else was here.

group_1.textRight: [chara:101201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ack! You're Kanagi Izumi!
H-how could I NOT know?! You're the boss@of the east!
Any Magical Girl who's been around for a@year or more would recognize you!
So what's got you looking so down?

group_1.textLeft: I'm not much of a maid. I'm completely@hopeless...

group_1.textRight: Hopeless?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. If I had a nickname, it would be@"Hopeless Maid" Nagitan.

group_1.textRight: That's pretty long for a nickname...

group_1.textLeft: Ah, you're right... [chara:101601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101601:cheek_0][chara:101601:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:101601:lipSynch_1]Yet another mistake to@add to my history as a maid.

group_1.textRight: I see...
(She's nothing like how people described@her.)
(She doesn't seem bold or fearless at all.)
(Right now she looks more like a sad little@kitten!)
(A usually fearless hero, pushed to despair@after some fateful event...)
(But it all leads to the comeback!)
That's it!!!
My name is Karin Misono!
Please tell me what's going on!
I might be able to help.
Yeah!
I think you'll be a great inspiration for@the manga I'm drawing, too!
So please! Tell me what happened!

group_1.textLeft: All right. I won't figure anything out just@thinking it over on my own.
And if it will help you as well, I wouldn't@mind your company.
